text: Mateus Lucena dos Santos (30 August 1994 – 28 November 2016), commonly known as Caramelo, was a Brazilian professional footballer who played for Chapecoense on loan from São Paulo FC as a right back. Caramelo was one of the victims when LaMia Airlines Flight 2933 crashed on 28 November 2016. ==Career statistics== Club Season League State League Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Mogi Mirim 2013 Série C 0 0 3 0 — — — 3 0 São Paulo 2013 Série A 3 0 — — 0 0 0 0 3 0 2016 4 0 8 0 0 0 4Appearance(s) in Copa Libertadores 0 — 16 0 Subtotal 7 0 8 0 0 0 4 0 0 0 19 0 Atlético Goianiense 2014 Série B 13 1 10 0 1 0 — — 24 1 Chapecoense 2015 Série A 4 0 1 0 0 0 4Appearance(s) in Copa Sudamericana 0 — 9 0 2016 3 0 — — 3 0 — 6 0 Subtotal 7 0 1 0 0 0 7 0 — 15 0 Career total 27 1 22 0 1 0 11 0 0 0 61 1 ==Honours== ;Chapecoense * Copa Sudamericana: 2016 (posthumously) ==References== Category:1994 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Footballers from São Paulo (state)
